title: 141 - Dragon Hunter
description:
Tim gets a holy seal of approval from a street walker. Heather's new trainer makes her cry, but she assures us that she’s loving it. Luke and Livy spar over sparse food. Jackson, in his latest rant, issues the final verdict on peanut butter and celery. Plus, an old gem straight from Tim’s Comedy Vault…the Stalker Song! 
Thank you to our sponsors!
Goodr: Go to goodr.com and use code TIM for 15% off at checkout! 
Athletic Greens: Get a free 1 year supply of Vitamin D and 5  travel packs with your first purchase! Visit athleticgreens.com/HAWKINS
